sentence.Network_en: I am at the beginning of a new and unutterable loneliness.
sentence.Network_cn: 我再次陷入莫名的孤独寂寞中。

sentence.Network_en: He was silent, and I guessed at his unutterable depression.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不讲话了, 但我猜他有满腔说不出的郁闷.

sentence.Network_en: Unutterable destruction and devastation were wrought last autumn.
sentence.Network_cn: 去年秋天造成了无以言宣的破坏和毁灭.

PerfectNetExp.abs: If we glimpse the unutterable(不可言传的),it is unwise to try to  utter it, nor should we seek to invest(赋予) with significance that which we.
unutloiu 乌努佐尤, unutterable 无法发音的, unutmaz 乌努特马兹
The at present unutterable things we may fine somewhere uttered., 目前难以解释的事情也许已在他处说明.
unutterable 极端的, unutterable 说不出的, unutterable 裤子

list.abs: 双语美文：青春物语... ... poignantly 痛切地;辛辣地 unutterably 非语言所能表达地 intolerable 无法忍受的,难耐的.
The at present unutterable things we may fine somewhere uttered., 目前难以解释的事情也许已在他处说明.
What unutterable pathos was in his voice !, 他的声音里有着多么难以形容的哀愁!
(ii)当 a 与 b 不可共度时， 不是一个有理数，他们称之为「不可说」(the unutterable)，是不可理喻的，好像是遭遇到「言语道断」的困境。（今日我们叫做「非比数」或「无理数」）他们拒绝承认.

entry.tran: （尤指不好的事情）无以名状的，难以形容的，莫名的
entry.def: You can use unutterable to emphasize that something, especially a bad quality, is great in degree or intensity.

example.ex: I am at the beginning of a new and unutterable loneliness.
example.tran: 我再次陷入莫名的孤独寂寞中。

auth_sentence.content: He clasped Frank's hand with a look of unutterable sympathy.
auth_sentence.res_content: He clasped Frank's hand with a look of unutterable sympathy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He clasped Frank's hand with a look of unutterable sympathy.

auth_sentence.content: His words infix'd unutterable care Deep in great Hector's soul.
auth_sentence.res_content: His words infix'd unutterable care Deep in great Hector's soul.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His words infix'd unutterable care Deep in great Hector's soul.

auth_sentence.content: You are an unutterable nuisance, but I suppose you must have your own way.
auth_sentence.res_content: You are an unutterable nuisance, but I suppose you must have your own way.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You are an unutterable nuisance, but I suppose you must have your own way.
